mapper.insert: insert into item_option(opt_num, i_num, option_title, option_content, o_price) values(optsq.nextval, (select i_num from sell_item where sel_num=(select sel_num from seller where userid=#{param1}) and rownum <= 1), #{param2},#{param3},#{param4})
mapper.select: SELECT si.i_num, si.sel_num, si.i_subject, si.i_cnt, si.i_img1, si.i_price, si.i_period, si.i_tag, s.userid, s.sel_prof FROM SELL_ITEM si JOIN SELLER s ON si.sel_num = s.sel_num WHERE sysdate<=si.i_period ORDER BY si.i_num DESC
